long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get Answers Fast with Ask Wali - The New Way to Internet

Stop wasting time scrolling through websites. With Ask Wali, you can instantly chat with local businesses directly from your Google search results.

Why Use Ask Wali?

Quick and Easy: No more endless browsingâ€”just click the Ask Wali icon and get the information you need instantly powered buy our local business AI.

Trusted Information: Wali is trained to answer questions about thousands of local businesses.

Why browse and read, when you can just ask Wali?

How It Works:
- Install the extension.
- Search on Google as usual.
- Click the Ask Wali icon next to supported businesses to start chatting.
